Title: 🖼 💡-Battle for light-: Ukrainian veterans will support Oleksand...
Description: 💡-Battle for light-: Ukrainian veterans will support Oleksandr Usyk About 40 Ukrainian veterans went to the fight of the Ukrainian champion with Tyson Fury in Saudi Arabia. Among them are miners and energy workers of DTEK, metallurgists and miners of Metinvest, and defenders of Mariupol within the framework of the Rinat Akhmetov-Heart project Azovstali-. The goal of the joint #BattleForLight campaign by Oleksandr Usyk and DTEK is to draw attention to the problems of the Ukrainian energy industry, which suffered due to Russian shelling, and to attract help from international partners for its restoration and protection. We remind you that the battle is already on December 21. We wish victory to Alexander! Thank you to all defenders of Ukraine 🇺🇦

Title: 🎬 🇺🇦#BattleForLight: Oleksandr Usyk together with famous Ukrai...
Description: 🇺🇦#BattleForLight: Oleksandr Usyk, together with famous Ukrainian musicians, supported air defense, rescuers and energy workers. Our legendary boxer and champion appealed to the musicians to organize a flash mob and write a real national anthem -Battle for light-, dedicated to everyone who does not allow Ukraine to be plunged into darkness .🔥 Already on the first day, Oleksandr Usyk's appeal was supported by ONUKA, MONATIK and Dakh Daughters. Thank you to everyone who supports air defense, rescuers and energy workers in these times of historical challenges. The battle for light continues! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 ‼️Russia delivered a massive blow to DTEK thermal power plants...
Description: ‼️Russia launched a massive attack on DTEK thermal power plants: equipment was damaged Today, December 13, Russia carried out another massive terrorist attack on the energy infrastructure of Ukraine. DTEK thermal power plants were attacked. According to preliminary information, there were no casualties. As a result of the massive attack, the equipment of the TPP was seriously damaged. After the end of the shelling, the energy companies quickly started to eliminate their consequences and restore the operation of the equipment. This year, this is already the twelfth mass attack on the Ukrainian energy industry and the ninth mass attack on the company's energy enterprises. In total, since the beginning of the full-scale invasion, the DTEK thermal power plant has been fired upon more than 200 times

Title: 🖼 ⚙️ Since the beginning of the year, DTEK has invested UAH 2.8 ...
Description: ⚙️ Since the beginning of the year, DTEK has invested UAH 2.8 billion in the restoration of damaged TPPs. This year, the enemy has already carried out 11 massive attacks on the Ukrainian energy system. However, energy workers work around the clock to eliminate the consequences of shelling as soon as possible. - In November, Russia used more than 400 missiles and drones against energy facilities in Ukraine. Our thermal power plants were also affected again. But energy workers are doing their best. The work continues non-stop, - said the general director of DTEK Energo Oleksandr Fomenko. During the full-scale invasion, Russia shelled the DTEK TPP more than 200 times. The battle for light continues! 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 ‼️An enemy drone attacked DTEK energy workers in the Dnipropet...
Description: ‼️An enemy drone attacked DTEK energy workers in the Dnipropetrovsk region  Energy workers were performing restoration work near the combat zone. During repairs, a Russian drone hit their car and exploded. 🙏 Fortunately, one of the energy workers noticed the drone in time, so they managed to find a safe place and no one from the repair crew was injured. Despite all the risks, energy workers continue to work 💪The battle for light continues! 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 💪🏻🇺🇦We are proud that DTEK is part of the SCM investment g...
Description: 💪🏻🇺🇦We are proud that DTEK is part of the SCM investment group, which, together with the Rinat Akhmetov Foundation and the Shakhtar football club, has already allocated UAH 10.6 billion (over $300 million) to help the country for almost three years of the war. The main areas of aid – support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, humanitarian support of civilians and communities, preparation for the restoration of Mariupol. We continue to do everything possible so that Ukraine can stand and win!

Title: 🔁🎬 Today was a report on energy. I am grateful to all our repai...
Description: Forwarded From Zelenskiy / OfficialToday there was a report on energy. I am grateful to all our repair crews, every employee of the energy companies who are now eliminating the consequences of the Russian strikes and protecting the system. Honest work in every region, at every facility is very important. And this is a responsibility not only for one's facility, but for the entire country - for the stability of our entire state and the protection of all our people. It is now necessary to work as much as possible at the level from the government and the Ministry of Energy to all our regions and communities. Glory to Ukraine! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 💡DTEK energy workers returned the light to 3,000 families in ...
Description: 💡DTEK energy workers returned the light to 3,000 families in Kyiv region after shelling. Tonight, the occupiers again attacked the Kyiv region with drones. Part of the residents of the Vyshgorod district were left without electricity due to damage to the power grids. As soon as the situation allowed, the energy companies began repair work. Currently, all homes are back with electricity - ✅ The battle for light continues. Believe in energy workers 🇺🇦

Description: ‼️Drones attacked energy workers in Dnipropetrovsk region Another difficult day for our colleagues from Dnipropetrovsk region. Despite the daily danger, we continue to do our best to provide power even in the midst of hostilities. The battle for light continues 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 🔥 What are energy workers preparing for this winter? Comedian...
Description: 🔥 What are energy workers preparing for this winter? Comedian Felix Redka met with Vitaly Shayda, general director of DTEK Kyiv Regional Electric Networks. They talked about the de-occupation of Kyiv region: what to do when you have 10,000 kilometers of destroyed power lines and how to fix it all in 45 days. Who is the Irpinsky ghost that returned the light during the occupation? Why energy work is so dangerous in times of war and what awaits us next. Enjoy watching, we look forward to your comments ❤️

Title: 🖼 Another terrible crime of the Russian occupiers. Yesterday, th...
Description: Another terrible crime of the Russian occupiers. Yesterday, the enemy launched a rocket attack on a nine-story building in Sumy. Today - on civil infrastructure and residential buildings in Odesa. In both cases, many were killed and injured. Sincere condolences to family and friends. Thank you to the doctors who are saving lives at this moment. We thank all rescuers of the State Emergency Service who work on the ground and do everything possible to eliminate the consequences of terrorist attacks.

Title: 🖼 Odesa: energy workers returned the light to 400,000 homes afte...
Description: Odeshchyna: power workers have restored power to 400,000 homes after a massive attack. Emergency repair work is ongoing in the region. Stabilization shutdown schedules are currently not in use, emergency power outages continue. Over the past day, power workers managed to restore power to 400,000 families. Currently, 321,000 customers in Odesa and the region remain without electricity. The most difficult situation is in the southern part of the city. Main power equipment is significantly damaged. Currently, it is not possible to restore the water and heat supply facilities of the Tairov microdistrict and the surrounding areas. Energy workers work on the ground. Work will continue around the clock until power is restored. We are working 24/7 to stabilize the situation as soon as possible and return to the projected schedules. The battle for light continues! Believe in energy workers 🇺🇦

Title: 🖼 💡Odeszine: energy workers revive critical infrastructure Afte...
Description: 💡Deodshchyna: Energy heal critical infrastructure after the morning hostile shelling, the Odessa power supply situation remains difficult. Also, where possible, energy returns light to homes. The most difficult situation in Odessa and the Odessa district. Unfortunately, there is no technical ability to fueled on the critical infrastructure of Kyiv (Tairova district) and Primorsky (Arcadia district). Works are ongoing. ‼ We re -enlist with large -scale destruction of energy objects, emergency shutdowns operate in Odessa region. All the energy of the region is steadily working to restore electricity as soon as possible. We are seeking for your patience and understanding. The battle for light continues.
